name: Alien Birthday Bash
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!

You wake up in a dark room. You see clouds flying around, and the floor is wet. You can't remember where you are, or how you got here. You can't even remember your name! You do know one thing. It's your birthday.

In Alien Birthday Bash, you play as Birthday Boy, as he tries to survive in this birthday dimension. To do this, he'll utilize whatever he can find in presents scattered around the map, as well as the occasional cupcake.

This game includes:
-A wide cast of strange enemy characters
-Groovy Tunes
-Enemy Book
-15 Unlockable characters, as well as 3 starting characters!
-Cake
-15 achievements to get
-Unique Items and Projectiles
-A Monkey

Controls:
W - Move Up, Menu Navigation
A - Move Left, Change Skins on Main Menu
S - Move Down, Menu Navigation
D - Move Right, Change Skins on Main Menu
Space - Accept
Up Arrow - Shoot Up
Left Arrow - Shoot Left
Down Arrow - Shoot Down
Right Arrow - Can you guess?
